Section.Catchline: Written notification in the absence of a prospectus.

SectionBody.Text: A mobile home park owner who enters into a rental agreement in which a prospectus is not provided shall give written notification to the mobile home owner of the following information prior to occupancy:

Subsection.Text: The nature and type of zoning under which the mobile home park operates; the name of the zoning authority which has jurisdiction over the land comprising the mobile home park; and a detailed description containing all information available to the mobile home park owner, including the time, manner, and nature, of any definite future plans which he or she has for future changes in the use of the land comprising the mobile home park or a portion thereof.
The name and address of the mobile home park owner or a person authorized to receive notices and demands on his or her behalf.
All fees and charges, assessments, or other financial obligations not included in the rental agreement and a copy of the rules and regulations in effect.
